mapper.select: select c.id, c.userId, c.postId, c.content, c.createDate, u.username from comment c inner join user u on c.userId = u.id where c.postId = #{postId} order by c.id desc
select c.id, c.userId, c.postId, c.content, c.createDate, u.username from comment c inner join user u on c.userId = u.id where c.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into comment(userId, postId, content, createDate) values(#{userId}, #{postId}, #{content}, now())
